author: JavierGarciadeCastro
body:
**PR description:**
This is a backport of PR #47938. This PR is designed for CMSSW_15_0_X to run the new DQM in the data-taking release, whereas the original (#47938) was designed for CMSSW_15_1_X. Description is specified in original PR.
**PR validation:**
We have checked out all dependencies and have a clean build. We applied the code-checks specified in PR #47235. Most runTheMatrix tests were successfully run as well, with a couple of errors coming from files not found:
[runall-report-step123-.log](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/19979777/runall-report-step123-.log)
title: [15_0_X] Run SingleMu and DoubleMu triggers separately and adapt to general workflow
